Package it.polimi.vovarini.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.vovarini.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.EventListener
Class that represents the Controller concept of the MVC pattern. Acts as a Listener to events triggered from the View, and updates the Model about it, notifying him of what he has to change

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Controller​(Game game)
    Builder of the controller class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Game getGame()  
    void update​(AvailableCardsEvent evt)
    This method reacts to the choice of one of the two/three elected cards as the player's own card, assigning him to the player who triggered the event
    void update​(BuildEvent evt)
    This method reacts to a Construction move sent by the player, checking if it's valid and, if it is, performing it
    void update​(CardChoiceEvent evt)
    This method reacts to the choice of the two/three cards the elected player chose to use as GodCard for the game
    void update​(MovementEvent evt)
    This method reacts to a Movement move sent by the player, checking if it's valid and, if it is, performing it
    void update​(RegistrationEvent evt)
    This method reacts to a nickname insertion by a player, registering him into the game or refusing his nickname if unacceptable
    void update​(SkipEvent evt)
    This method reacts to the choice by a player to skip the phase he's currently in.
    void update​(SpawnWorkerEvent evt)
    This method reacts to the choice of a player about placing one of his worker on the board in the pre-game initialization
    void update​(UndoEvent evt)
    This method reacts to an undo command performed by the player, undoing the last move done by the player
    void update​(WorkerSelectionEvent evt)
    This method reacts to the selection of a worker by a player, highlighting it as selected worker

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller​(Game game)
      Builder of the controller class
      Parameters:
      game - is the instance of the game currently played by the players, who the controller handles

  • Method Details

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()

    • update

      public void update​(RegistrationEvent evt)
      This method reacts to a nickname insertion by a player, registering him into the game or refusing his nickname if unacceptable
      Parameters:
      evt - is the RegistrationEvent the view generates when a player wants to log into the game
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - if another player wants to log into the game, but the game already has all its players

    • update

      public void update​(AvailableCardsEvent evt)
      This method reacts to the choice of one of the two/three elected cards as the player's own card, assigning him to the player who triggered the event
      Parameters:
      evt - is the AvailableCardsEvent generated by the choice of the cards to utilize in the game by an elected player

    • update

      public void update​(CardChoiceEvent evt)
      This method reacts to the choice of the two/three cards the elected player chose to use as GodCard for the game
      Parameters:
      evt - is the CardChoiceEvent a player generates after selecting the GodCard he wants to have in the game

    • update

      public void update​(WorkerSelectionEvent evt)
      This method reacts to the selection of a worker by a player, highlighting it as selected worker
      Parameters:
      evt - is the WorkerSelectionEvent the view generates when a player selects the Worker he wants to use
      Throws:
      InvalidPhaseException - The selection of the Worker must be performed during Phase.Start. If the controller receives this event in another phase, something is wrong
      WrongPlayerException - Another player must not be able to select a Worker when he's not playing

    • update

      public void update​(SpawnWorkerEvent evt)
      This method reacts to the choice of a player about placing one of his worker on the board in the pre-game initialization
      Parameters:
      evt - is the SpawnWorkerEvent the view generates when a player has to place a Worker for the first time
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerException - Another player must not be able to choose the starting position of the current player's own Worker
      InvalidPositionException - If the player tries to put his Worker outside the board
      OverwrittenWorkerException - If the player tries to put his Worker on top of another Worker (of any player)

    • update

      public void update​(BuildEvent evt)
      This method reacts to a Construction move sent by the player, checking if it's valid and, if it is, performing it
      Parameters:
      evt - is the BuildEvent the view generates when a player wants to perform a Construction move
      Throws:
      InvalidPositionException - If the box selected by the player as the construction target is not inside the valid boxes computed by computeBuildablePoints
      InvalidPhaseException - If the player triggers a Construction move in a phase that is not Phase.Construction
      WrongPlayerException - If a construction move is triggered by a player which is not the one currently playing
      InvalidMoveException - If a player selects a valid Box, but tries to build an invalid block in terms of level

    • update

      public void update​(MovementEvent evt)
      This method reacts to a Movement move sent by the player, checking if it's valid and, if it is, performing it
      Parameters:
      evt - is the MovementEvent the view generates when a player wants to perform a Movement move
      Throws:
      InvalidPhaseException - If the player triggers a Movement move in a phase that is not Phase.Movement
      WrongPlayerException - If a movement move is triggered by a player which is not the one currently playing
      InvalidPositionException - If the box selected by the player as the movement target is not inside the valid boxes computed by computeReachablePoints
      InvalidMoveException - This should never happen, as there are not other controls to perform other than reach.

    • update

      public void update​(UndoEvent evt)
      This method reacts to an undo command performed by the player, undoing the last move done by the player
      Parameters:
      evt - is the UndoEvent the view generates when a player wants to undo a move he just performed
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerException - if another player tries to undo the last move performed, a move that he did not perform

    • update

      public void update​(SkipEvent evt)
      This method reacts to the choice by a player to skip the phase he's currently in. If the phase is unskippable an exception will be thrown. If not, the player goes to the next Phase.
      Parameters:
      evt - is the SkipEvent the view generates when a player wants to skip to the next phase
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerException - if another players tries to skip a phase when he's not currently playing
      UnskippablePhaseException - if the current player tries to skip a phase while he did not perform the required actions of that phase
